meanings.sent1: I always preabsorb the information before the lecture.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel will preabsorb any excess liquid.
meanings.sent3: The sponge decided to preabsorb all the water before the spill happened.
meanings.sent4: Her mind seemed to preabsorb the knowledge effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The thirsty soil seemed to preabsorb the raindrops eagerly.
